metaTitle: VILLA LO LORENZO Los Alcazares | 3-Bed Villas from €590,000
metaDescription: Discover VILLA LO LORENZO in Los Alcazares, Murcia. Modern 3-bedroom villas from €590,000 by PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE. Delivery 2027. Beach & golf nearby.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to VILLA LO LORENZO, an exceptional new residential development in the heart of Los Alcazares, Murcia, crafted by the reputable PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE. These stunning 3-bedroom villas represent the pinnacle of contemporary coastal living, combining sophisticated architecture with modern amenities and an enviable location. Starting from €590,000, VILLA LO LORENZO offers discerning buyers a rare opportunity to invest in premium Spanish property, with completion scheduled for July 2027. Each villa features 150m² of beautifully designed living space set on generous 300m² plots, providing the perfect balance of comfort, privacy, and investment potential. Los Alcazares has emerged as one of Spain's most sought-after locations for international buyers, offering authentic Mediterranean lifestyle without the premium price tags of island markets. Whether you're seeking a personal residence, holiday home, or investment property, VILLA LO LORENZO delivers exceptional value and lifestyle quality in a thriving expatriate community where English is widely spoken and amenities are world-class.

locationSection.intro: Los Alcazares is a charming coastal municipality in Murcia that has rapidly become one of Spain's most attractive destinations for international property buyers. Situated on the Mar Menor coastline, this vibrant town offers an authentic Spanish Mediterranean experience combined with modern European conveniences. The area is renowned for its warm climate year-round, stunning Blue Flag beaches, championship golf courses, and welcoming expatriate community. With property values appreciating at 8% annually and rental yields of €800 per week, Los Alcazares represents exceptional investment potential. The town balances peaceful residential living with easy access to amenities, excellent healthcare facilities within 30 minutes, international schools, and diverse shopping options. For those seeking Mediterranean coastal living with strong fundamentals and genuine community spirit, Los Alcazares delivers an unmatched combination of lifestyle, investment returns, and affordability—approximately 40% less expensive than comparable Spanish island markets.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Golf: Several championship courses nearby, including Mar Menor courses
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics with English-speaking doctors
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets plus local markets
Restaurants: Wide selection of Spanish and international dining throughout town

propertyFeatures.intro: VILLA LO LORENZO villas are constructed to the highest Spanish building standards with premium materials and meticulous attention to detail. Each villa showcases modern architecture and contemporary design principles, ensuring energy efficiency, comfort, and aesthetic appeal. The development features quality finishes throughout, including thermal-efficient systems, modern fixtures, and thoughtful design that maximizes natural light and ventilation. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE has prioritized sustainable construction practices and durable materials to ensure these homes maintain their value and appeal for decades. Every villa is built to exceed standard requirements, with features designed specifically for the demanding expectations of international buyers seeking Mediterranean luxury at accessible prices.
features: Private swimming pool with stunning views
Double glazing with thermal break technology

content.investmentSection: VILLA LO LORENZO represents a compelling investment opportunity in one of Spain's fastest-growing property markets. Los Alcazares has experienced consistent year-on-year appreciation of 8%, significantly outperforming broader market averages. The rental market is robust, with similar properties generating €800 per week during peak season, providing strong income potential for investors. Remarkably, properties in Los Alcazares are valued approximately 40% below comparable developments in Spanish island markets like Mallorca or Ibiza, while offering superior amenities and stronger growth trajectories. The town's rapidly expanding expatriate community—estimated at over 40% of residents—creates sustained demand for quality residential properties. With completion scheduled for 2027, early investors benefit from completion-based pricing before market appreciation fully materializes. Whether purchased as a primary residence, vacation home, or pure investment, VILLA LO LORENZO offers multiple pathways to returns in a transparent, established market with proven appreciation trends and consistent international buyer interest.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in VILLA LO LORENZO?
faqs.answer: VILLA LO LORENZO villas start from €590,000. Each property offers 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and 150m² of living space on 300m² plots. Contact us for current availability and detailed pricing information.

faqs.question: When will VILLA LO LORENZO be completed?
faqs.answer: VILLA LO LORENZO is scheduled for completion on 01-07-2027. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty. Contact us for specific unit delivery schedules and payment plan details.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of VILLA LO LORENZO?
faqs.answer: PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE is the developer. They have an established track record building quality homes in Los Alcazares and throughout the Murcia region, with a reputation for professional project delivery and customer satisfaction.

faqs.question: Is Los Alcazares a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Los Alcazares offers an established and welcoming international community where English is commonly spoken. Property values have appreciated 8% year-on-year, significantly above national averages. Amenities include a regional hospital within 30 minutes, multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, and several championship golf courses. The market is transparent, costs are 40% below island markets, and rental yields are strong at €800 per week.

faqs.question: How far is VILLA LO LORENZO from the beach?
faqs.answer: VILLA LO LORENZO is within 20 minutes of multiple Blue Flag beaches, providing easy access to pristine Mediterranean coastline, water sports, and beach amenities. Several beaches in the Mar Menor area are accessible by car or local transport.

faqs.question: What amenities are near VILLA LO LORENZO?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for shopping, a regional hospital within 30 minutes with English-speaking doctors available, several championship golf courses nearby, and a wide selection of restaurants and bars throughout Los Alcazares town center.

content.conclusion: VILLA LO LORENZO represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire premium Mediterranean property in one of Spain's most desirable and undervalued locations. The combination of competitive pricing, strong appreciation trends, thriving international community, outstanding amenities, and trusted developer credentials creates a compelling investment case. Whether you envision a personal residence with access to world-class beaches and golf courses, a profitable rental investment generating consistent returns, or a vacation home in a welcoming English-speaking community, VILLA LO LORENZO delivers on multiple fronts. The July 2027 completion timeline means you can secure your property now before values fully appreciate. We encourage you to explore this exceptional development further. Contact PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE today via WhatsApp or phone to discuss availability, arrange site visits, or receive detailed property information. Our team is ready to guide you through the purchasing process and help you make an informed decision about your Spanish property investment.
